s.text: Rates vary greatly according to season and availability; many hotels offer special weekend packages, business rates, and promotions.

To make direct reservations with a hotel, we have included addresses (all in California, abbreviated CA) and telephone/fax numbers.
Breakfast is not usually included at US hotels, except on executive floors and at some budget motels that offer morning coffee, orange juice, and doughnuts or muffins.
